body.name: Hydream Stove Top for Silicone Shelf,30 Inch Magnetic Shelf Over the Stove Spice Rack,Kitchen Shelf for Above Stovetop Organizer Magnet Flat Back of Stove Storage Suctioned for The Stove-Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 43 mins
features: 【Space Saver】Perfect for organizing your spices,holding condiments, no more getting mess or searching for the spice you need while cooking! Keeping all of the small things within close reach and won’t take up valuable counter space. Creates more usable space in your kitchen!

【8 Strong Magnets】8 large magnets cover the entire back area ensures sturdy enough to support and it would be much more securing. It clings to the top of the stove so there is no movement or possibility of anything falling off. Great for the gap or flat top ovens.

【Stay in Place】 hold things on the back of stove securely and in place. your stuff won't fall down to the stove any more when you open and shut the stove door, bump. also helps block things from falling behind the stove.

【Premium Silicone】secure and made of thick solid silicone it does not get hot or transfer heat to ingredients stored. Sturdy and wide enough to hold a lot of spices. Its more ideal than a metal one so it could be washed and not rust or get totally gunked up.

【Easy to Clean】Flexible, easy lays down and remove for cleaning. heavy silicone able to hold it's shape up and keep your stove clean, it won't slip off the stove top. Great for getting your spices in easy access when cooking. A must have for kitchen organization!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The kirtchen organizer I never knew I needed
reviews.reviewText: I tend to keep the spices I use regularly close at hand, but this makes that so much easier! This fits perfectly on top of the range and stays where I put it. Yes, it gets a bit greasy when I am frying, but it comes clean with either a quick wipe or a quick wash if needed. I don't keep bottle in it, Just spices. I am amazed at how useful I find this. (If you have ever had a small spice jar fall behind your stove you will understand). This fills that gap between the stove and the backsplash so I don't have to worry about chasing those small jars anymore. It holds a lot and stays firmly in place. I will be giving a few of these out to my home cook friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic space saver
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This product is fantastic, the magnets are very heavy duty. I love that it’s removable so it’s very easy to clean. I can store my cute measuring cups and timer on top of the stove top and put my sourdough starter under the light which just helps with keeping it warm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT fit, strong magnets, really well made!
reviews.reviewText: We live in a TINY apartment with very little storage, so for us, this was the perfect kitchen addition, and it was super affordable. These silicone "shelves" are really well made, NOT flimsy by any means, and the magnets are strong! Truly, you are NOT wasting your money on these. The 2 packs fits across the top absolutely perfectly! Order with complete confidence. I love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are magnetic so you just sat them down and forget it. So easy and they hold a lot of spices. Easy to take off and clean. We like them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works but not strong magnets
reviews.reviewText: It works and I like that it is silicone. Makes the top of the stove more useful but the magnets are so weak I questioned whether it was supposed to be magnetic or not. I had to look in the description to verify.Overall I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to my kitchen
reviews.reviewText: It may be magnetized on the bottom, but I found out that my stove top is not steel. Even so, it sits perfectly atop my stove top allowing me to reach for the most commonly used spices. It doesn't move and everything stays in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I thought this would work for my stove top. While it stays in place, it is pointless. It is easier to clean the stove top. My husband does not like them either and he is the one that cooks most meals. When our son gets a place of his own, he will get these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these!!
reviews.reviewText: I had no idea they made such things and I’m so happy to stumble across them! These are amazing space savers. I love having my seasonings handy when I cook so I can see what I have and not have to dig in my cupboard. Very nice idea.
